channel.title: CVE Feed for Fortinet -- Fortinet FortiManager
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Fortinet -- Fortinet FortiManager

item.title: CVE-2022-22303|2024-08-03T03:07:50.277Z -- fortinet -- fortinet%20fortimanager
item.description: An exposure of sensitive system information to an unauthorized control sphere vulnerability [CWE-497] in FortiManager versions prior to 7.0.2, 6.4.7 and 6.2.9 may allow a low privileged authenticated user to gain access to the FortiGate users credentials via the config conflict file.
